title: What can Fascination do? / Non-verbal hypnotic techniques with Dr. Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass is the most advanced in this field. There he reaches Fascination and Mesmerism. In this video we can see how using Fascination - the power of the gaze can induce such powerful hypnotic states in the subjects and to liberate them deeply. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
